text: @realDonaldTrump @GregAbbott_TX Almost 60k US deaths in 2 months because of #COVID19. It’s more than those who died in Vietnam and 20k more than the annual death rate in car accidents in the US each year. #TrumpKnew #TrumpLiesPeopleDie https://t.co/b2P2G3q2sN
